titles.title: I Will Give Thanks to Thee

comments.comment:
chorus 1 (played after 1st time) chorus 2 (played after 2nd time)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

properties.copyright: 1977 Scripture In Song, Administered by Integrity Music, Inc.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
A
I will give thanks to Thee
O Lord among the people
I will sing praises to Thee
Among the nations

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
For Thy steadfast love is great
Is great to the heavens
And Thy faithfulness
Thy faithfulness to the clouds

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Be exalted O God above the heavens
Let Thy glory be over all the earth
(Repeat)

verse.name: c2a
verse.lines:
Be exalted O God above the heavens
Let Thy glory be over all the earth

verse.name: c2b
verse.lines:
Be exalted O God above the heavens
Let Thy glory
Let Thy glory
Let Thy glory be over
All the earth
